Category:Star Wars: War of the Bounty Hunters

nodes.text: Doctor Aphra 10 is the tenth issue of the canon comic book series Star Wars: Doctor Aphra. It was written by Alyssa Wong, illustrated by Ray-Anthony Height and Rachelle Rosenberg, and published by Marvel Comics on May 26, 2021. It features the prelude story "The Invitation," which leads into the Star Wars: War of the Bounty Hunters crossover event.

PRELUDE TO WAR OF THE BOUNTY HUNTERS: "THE INVITATION" DOCTOR APHRA and SANA STARROS find themselves cornered by VUKORAH and the UNBROKEN CLAN! Can they pull off a daring escape—even if that means surrendering the NIHIL HYPERDRIVE? And what sets them on a collision course with one of the most deadly BOUNTY HUNTERS in the galaxy?
